text: Hypselospinus is a genus of iguanodontian dinosaur which was first described as a species of Iguanodon (I. fittoni) by Richard Lydekker in 1889, the specific name honouring William Henry Fitton. Hypselospinus grew to be around 6 meters (19.7 ft) long. == Synonyms == *Iguanodon fittoni (Lydekker, 1889) = Hypselospinus fittoni *Wadhurstia (Carpenter & Ishida, 2010) = Hypselospinus fittoni ==References== Category:Cretaceous dinosaurs Category:Ornithopods
title: Hypselospinus
